}} '''Lee Grinner Pace''' (born [[25 March]] [[1979]]) is an American actor. His break began playing Calpernia Addams, a male-to-female transsexual, in the film ''[[wikipedia:Soldier's Girl|Soldier's Girl]]'', but he is best known for playing the starring role, Ned, in ''[[wikipedia:Pushing Daisies|Pushing Daisies]]''. He portrayed the Elvenking [[Thranduil]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].<ref>[http://www.facebook.com/PeterJacksonNZ Peter Jackson], "[http://www.facebook.com/notes/peter-jackson/casting-news/10150239464391558 Casting News!]" dated 30 April 2011 (accessed 9 July 2011)</ref>
